SystemParameters Class

In this Article

Contains properties that you can use to query system settings.

Events summary

StaticPropertyChanged

Occurs when one of the properties changes.

Properties

  • Border

    Gets the border multiplier factor that determines the width of a window's sizing border.

    public static int Border { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      A multiplier.

    Remarks

    Maps to SPI_GETBORDER. See SystemParametersInfo.

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ SystemParameters.Border}"/>

  • BorderKey

    Gets the ResourceKey for the stem.Windows.SystemParameters.Border* property.

    public static System.Windows.ResourceKey BorderKey { get; }

    Property Value

    • ResourceKey

      A resource key.

    Remarks

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ { SystemParameters.BorderKey}}"/>

  • BorderWidth

    Gets the metric that determines the border width of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

    public static double BorderWidth { get; }

    Property Value

    • Double

      A border width.

    Remarks

    The metric is obtained from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. See SystemParametersInfo.

    XAML Attribute Usage

    <object property="{ SystemParameters.BorderWidth}"/>
